mapper.sql: SELECT r.id AS route_id, r.country_from, r.country_to, r.seat_class, r.distance, r.price, a.id AS airline_id, a.title AS airline_title, c.id AS company_id, c.title AS company_title FROM routes r JOIN airlines a ON a.id = r.airline_id JOIN company c ON c.id = a.company_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO routes (id, country_from, country_to, seat_class, distance, price, airline_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{countryFrom}, #{countryTo}, #{seatClass}, #{distance}, #{price}, #{airline.id}) AS new ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE country_from = new.country_from, country_to = new.country_to, seat_class = new.seat_class, distance = new.distance, price = new.price, airline_id = new.airline_id
mapper.update: UPDATE routes SET country_from = #{countryFrom}, country_to = #{countryTo}, seat_class = #{seatClass}, distance = #{distance}, price = #{price}, airline_id = #{airline.id} WHERE id = #{id}
